name: 運動經濟學專題研究
description: 本課程旨在帶領碩博研究生探究運動經濟學，內容含括中華職棒、美國職棒、日本職棒、美國職籃、歐洲足球、職業網球、職業高爾夫等職業運動之經濟分析。本課程亦教授運動經濟學相關之計量分析，希望藉由豐富的運動資料，讓學生學習大數據的分析技巧。
goals: 讓學生了解運動經濟目前研究的發展
訓練學生資料分析及論文寫作之能力
syllabus:
一(2/18)

Introduction---paper assigned | STATA Training.

二(2/25)

Salary Disparities and Organizational Performance | STATA Training.

三(3/4)

“Raising Salary or Redistributing It: A Panel Analysis of the Major League Baseball”, _Economics Letters_ (SSCI), Volume 107, Issue 2, Pages 297-299.

四(3/11)

“The Effects of Equities on Team Performance for Winners and Losers in Nippon Professional Baseball: A Quantile Analysis”, _Giornale degli Economisti_ (EconLit), Volume 70, Number 1, Pages 117-138.

五(3/18)

STATA Training.

六(3/25)

“Minority’s Salary Discrimination in the Chinese Professional Baseball League,” _International Journal of Sport Finance_ (SSCI), Volume 7, Number 1, Pages 73-93 (NSC 99-2410-H-128 -009). |STATA Training.

七(4/1)

Presentation, Discussing and Advising 1, 2, 3.  | STATA Training.

八(4/8)

Peer Effects on Pay and Mincerian Wage Equation | STATA Training.

九(4/15)

Midterm: paper presentation

十(4/22)

**Money ball**

十一(4/29)

“The Effect of Star Quality on Attendance Demand: The Case of the National Basketball Association,” _Journal of Sports Economics_ (SSCI), Published online before print (April 9, 2014), DOI 1527002514530405.STATA Training.

十二(5/6)

“Individual Efficiencies and Club Performance: An Empirical Panel Analysis of Professional Baseball”, _Managerial and Decision Economics_ (EconLit), Volume 31, Issue 5, Pages 363 – 372 (NSC 96-2451-H-128-007).

十三(5/13)

Salary Structures and Team Performance and

Competitive Balance and the Demand of Sports | STATA Training.

十四(5/20)

Presentation, Discussing and Advising 4, 5, 6.  | STATA Training.

十五(5/27)

“The Effects of Outcome Uncertainties, Patriotism, and Asian Regionalism in the World Baseball Classic,” _Journal of Media Economics_ (SSCI), Volume 26, Issue 3, Pages 148-161, DOI: 10.1080/08997764.2013.811586.

十六(6/3)

Presentation, Discussing and Advising 7, 8, 9.  | STATA Training.

十七(6/10)

Peer Effects and Individual Performance: Evidence from Swimming Competitions. _Journal of Sports Economics_, 16(5), 531-539. DOI: 1527002514521429.

十八(6/17)

Final reports
